recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 350F. Grease 10 inch angle food (tube) cake pan.

In a smal bowl, mix sugar, pecan, and cinnamon for the filling. Set aside. In a medium bowl, mix the flour, baking powder, bakind soda, and salt; set aside. In a large bowl, beat granulated sugar, butter, vanilla, and eggs. Beat in flour mixture alternately with sour cream slowly.
Spread 1/3 of the batter (about 2 cups) in pan; sprinkle with 1/3 of the filling. Repeat twice.
Bake for 1 hour. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan.
Meanwhile, in a saucepan, brown butter. Remove from heat and mix with powdered sugar and vanilla. Stir in just enough milk until glaze is smooth and thin enough to drizzle.
